room_title: Escape room "Wild West Showdown" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: The owners were very accommodating and extremely nice with helping us get everyone in and taken care of. Even if anyone is nervous about being in a closed room, she will walk you and show you the key and make your worries go away! We did the Wild West and the men did One if by land. If you need reading glasses don't forget them, cause you will need them to read things. All in all the rooms were very well put together and cleverly done!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West Showdown" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: Went with my daughters and sister for a fun birthday event. We had a blast. The owners are terrific and did everything to ensure we had a great time. Will definitely go back to try the other two rooms. We did the Wild West. Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West Showdown" by Time Travel Escapes in West Palm Beach
review: Hubby got me the Wild West Room as a Christmas gift.  Just left here. Had an amazing time. When went 8 minutes over but we really enjoyed it and can't wait to go back and try the other rooms. Highly recommend this place.
